Package com.orchestranetworks.ui.form.widget

This package provides a library of user interface widgets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
UIAtomicWidget This interface is common to all EBX5 model-driven widgets based on a single data model field.
UIAtomicWithEnumeration This interface is common to all EBX5 model-driven widgets based on a single data model enumerated field.
UIAtomicWithEnumerationItem This interface represents an item in the parent interface UIAtomicWithEnumeration, which corresponds to an index in the enumeration.
UICheckBox This interface represents a checkbox corresponding to an index in an enumeration.
UICheckBoxGroup Group of checkboxes based on an enumeration.
UIComboBox Combo box composed of a drop-down list and a text box to filter the list.
UIDateTime Date/time field.
UIDropDownList Simple HTML drop-down list.
UIListBox Simple HTML list box, with multi-selection.
UIRadioButton This interface represents a radio button corresponding to an index in an enumeration.
UIRadioButtonGroup Group of radio buttons based on an enumeration.
UITable This interface represents a table component.
UITextBox One-line or multi-line text box.
UIWidget This interface is common to all EBX5 model-driven widgets.
 

Package com.orchestranetworks.ui.form.widget Description

This package provides a library of user interface widgets.
